snippet.title: Design & Conjure - Trailer
snippet.description:
Hello friends!

Design & Conjure is a decorating game with light puzzle elements where you play as Dalia, a young witch! Meet interesting characters as you clean and decorate the town to your liking while listening to cozy beats.

This year we are heading to Gamescom 2024 to showcase our demo on the Indie Arena Booth ^^
We are very excited and wanted to show a bit of our demo :)

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2390130?utm_source=yt
